int main(){
	int t,n;
	si(t);
	while(t--){
		si(n);
		cin.ignore();
		map<string,int> vote_info;
		map<string,int> prev_info;
		int ans=0;
		FOR(j,n){
			char s[105];
			string name="";
			char vote;
			fgets(s,105,stdin);
			int l=strlen(s);
			int plus;
			FOR(i,l){
				if(s[i]!=' '){
					char tmp[5];
					tmp[0]=s[i];
					tmp[1]='\0';
					string app(tmp);
					name+=app;
				}
				else{
					if(s[i+1]=='+')plus=1;
					else plus=0;
					break;
				}
			}
			//cout<<name<<" "<<plus<<endl;
			if(!prev_info[name]){
				if(plus){
					prev_info[name]=1,ans++;
				}
				else{
					prev_info[name]=-1,ans--;	
				} 
			}
			else{
				if(prev_info[name]==1)ans--;
				else ans++;
				if(plus)ans++,prev_info[name]=1;
				else ans--,prev_info[name]=-1;
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	

	return 0;
}
